div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

input.name: q
input.onblur: if (this.value == "") {this.value = "Type and hit enter to search...";}
input.onfocus: if (this.value == "Type and hit enter to search...") {this.value = "";}
input.value: Type and hit enter to search...

b:includable.b:if:
<style>
	    .topfeatured-area {
	      background: url() no-repeat center center;
		  background-size: cover;
	  	  background-attachment: fixed;
	    }
	    .topfeatured-area:before {
	      content: "";
		  position: absolute;
		  width: 100%;
		  height: 100%;
		  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75);
		  top: 0;
	    }
	    </style>

b:if.div:
404 Page Not Found
We're sorry but we could not find the page you are looking for.
This may happen if you have entered site url incorrectly or this page doesn't exist anymore.
You can try searching page again or go back to home

a.expr:style: "background:" + (data:post.thumbnailUrl ? "url(" + data:post.thumbnailUrl + ")" : data:post.firstImageUrl ? "url(" + data:post.firstImageUrl + ")" : "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)") + " no-repeat center center;background-size:cover"

span.h5: This is the most recent post.

b:includable.b:if:
<style>
	  .middle-big-top {
	    background: url() no-repeat center center;
		background-size: cover;
		padding:25px 0;
		}
	  .middle-big-top:before {
		content: "";
		position: absolute;
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
		background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85);
		top: 0;
	  }
	  </style>

<style>
	    .middle-big-bottom {
		background: url() no-repeat center center;
		background-size: cover;
		padding:25px 0;
	   }
	   .middle-big-bottom:before {
	    content: "";
		position: absolute;
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
		background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85);
		top: 0;
	  }
	  </style>

div.div: Enter your email address to subscribe to this blog and receive notifications of new posts by email.

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: [img src="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XnuiloUNOA0/VTrt2fyh4eI/AAAAAAAAAa4/Wro4KB-_5CM/s1600/SNewsLogo.png"/] <small>The second monster followed the first, and at that the artilleryman began to crawl very cautiously across the hot heather ash towards Horsell. He managed to get alive into the ditch by the side of the road, and so escaped to Woking</small>
